main event: A UFO sighting was reported by two 16-year-old high school students in Newport News, Virginia on April 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately one minute before it became obscured by a roofline., The shape of the object was described as a ballistic missile, bright silver and two inches long., Observers used binoculars to view the object, which was first seen approximately 30 degrees above the horizon., The object made a 90-degree right turn during its flight., A T-33 aircraft was reported to be in the vicinity around the same time.
sighted object: a bright silver object shaped like a ballistic missile
witness description: two 16-year-old high school students who seemed intelligent and sincere
